### GitHub labels

#### Topic labels

<!-- DO NOT EDIT BY HAND: it should be generated using the carpenter       -->
<!-- R package https://github.com/fmichonneau/carpenter                    -->
<!-- and running:                                                          -->
<!--   carpenter::document_github_labels("data/github_labels.csv")         -->
<!-- the canonical definition of the GitHub labels is stored in the CSV    -->


This is a draft. The labels, and their definitions might change.

<ul><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #ffffff; background-color: #455964; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">bug-bbq</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #455964</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Good for Bug BBQ </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Good target for or related to Bug BBQ event </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #FFEB3A; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">good first issue</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #FFEB3A</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Good for new Contributors </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Good issue for a new Contributor </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #ffffff; background-color: #D22E2E; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">high-priority</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #D22E2E</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Need to be addressed ASAP </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Issue that needs to be fixed as soon as possible because the lesson uses code that doesnâ€™t work anymore </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #ffffff; background-color: #E55100; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">status:blocked</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #E55100</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Progress on addressing issue blocked </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Issue can't be fixed because a technical problem is hindering progress. A Maintainer or someone else in the community should be notified to ensure that progress is being made. </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #ffffff; background-color: #33681E; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">status:completed</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #33681E</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Issue successfully resolved </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> A PR has been merged, the issue is fully addressed. </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #BDBDBD; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">status:duplicate</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #BDBDBD</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Issue or PR already exists </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Issue raised previously, it should be linked to it by referring to it by its number in the comment before this label is used. </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #FFF8C4; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">status:help-wanted</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #FFF8C4</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Looking for Community Input </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Help from additional member of the Community is needed in order to address this issue. </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #9BCC65; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">status:in-progress</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #9BCC65</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Contributor working on issue </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> A Contributor is actively working on addressing the issue, this label should be used once someone has been assigned the issue. Because, we can only assign people using GitHub's interface when they are part of the organization, the assignment is done by tagging them in a comment of the issue. The Maintainer should set an initial deadline for a PR to be submitted. We suggest 7 days, but it can be adapted to the discretion of the Maintainer depending on the complexity of the task. </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #DCECC7; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">status:need-contributor</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #DCECC7</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Looking for Contributors </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Issue reviewed by Maintainers, and ready to be addressed. Maintainers are looking for contributors to address this issue. </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #EE6C00; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">status:need-more-info</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #EE6C00</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> More information needed </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Issue doesn't include enough information to proceed </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #FFCC7F; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">status:out-of-scope</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #FFCC7F</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Issue or PR out of scope </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Issue that doesn't fall within the scope of the lesson </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #679F38; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">status:pr-in-review</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #679F38</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> PR being reviewed by Maintainers </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> A PR has been submitted to address this issue, and is under review by the Maintainers </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #FFDFB2; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">status:refer-to-cac</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #FFDFB2</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Curriculum Advistory Committee input needed </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Maintainers need advice from the Curriculum Advisory Committee to make a decision on how to proceed about addressing this issue </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #FFF2DF; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">status:wait</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #FFF2DF</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Progress dependent on other issue or conversation </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Issue dependent on another issue or ongoing conversation and cannot be addressed at this time. </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #ffffff; background-color: #EB3F79; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">type:bug</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #EB3F79</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Issue with code </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Issue about the code, including challenges, answers. </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #ffffff; background-color: #00ACC0; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">type:clarification</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #00ACC0</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Issue or PR to make lesson clearer </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Part of a lesson which, while not incorrect (i.e., not a bug) is presented in a way that is potentially confusing or misleading. Existing content could benefit from rephrasing or rearranging. </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #B2E5FC; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">type:discussion</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #B2E5FC</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Issue to ask question </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Issue used to ask a question about how the lesson is taught, ask for clarification. Such issues might indicate that the instructor guide or the documentation may need to be updated. </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #4CB6AC; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">type:documentation</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #4CB6AC</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Issue about auxiliary files </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Issue about something being outdated or inaccurate in the documentation of the process to building, or maintaining the lesson. </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #7FDEEA; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">type:enhancement</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #7FDEEA</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Propose enhancement to the lesson </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Proposal to add new content to the lesson (e.g., introducing additional function, library, command, flag), or adding more technical detail on a topic already covered in the lesson. Such issues may need to be considered by the infrastructure sub-committee, the curriculum advisory committee, or other relevant group. </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #ffffff; background-color: #029AE5; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">type:feedback</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #029AE5</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Issue to provide feedback on lesson </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> General feedback on the lesson content </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #ffffff; background-color: #AC1357; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">type:formatting</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #AC1357</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Issue with lesson formatting </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Issue about something being wrong in the formatting of the lesson </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #ffffff; background-color: #00887A; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">type:instructor-guide</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #00887A</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Issue with the instructor guide </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Issue related to the content of the instructor guide </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #CED8DC; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">type:teaching-example</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #CED8DC</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> PR showing how lesson was modified in a particular workshop </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> PR that illustrates how someone modified the lesson in their workshop. Not intended to be merged, but as a way to document how other instructors have used the lesson. </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #7985CB; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">type:template-and-tools</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #7985CB</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Issue about template and tools </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Issue or feature request about a technical aspect of the lesson (e.g., in the scripts used to render the lesson) </li>
 </ul>
</li><li><span style="font-family: monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; color: #222222; background-color: #F8BAD0; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px;">type:typo-text</span>
  <ul>
    <li><b>Hex code:</b> #F8BAD0</li>
    <li><b>Short Description:</b> Typo in text </li>
    <li><b>Long Description:</b> Issue about a typo in the text/code of the lesson </li>
 </ul>
</li></ul>
